remarks: Closure law for negative of reals.  (Note: this inference proof style and the deduction theorem usage in ~ renegcl is deprecated, but is retained for its demonstration value.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-1997.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
statement:
renegcl.1 $e |- A e. RR $.
renegcli $p |- -u A e. RR $.
